pages.title: Mysterious Dust
pages.text: Fill an empty rod with mystery, then crush it. $(br2)Alternatively, right click a grass block with another mysterious dust, and wait to harvest the mysterious grass that grows.

pages.title: Mysterious Blocks
pages.text: Dusts can be crafted into blocks, for further processing and crafting.
Crush stone into dust. When crafted into a block, it can be smelted into glass in a furnace.
